spec.name: Fringer
spec.subtitle: Discovering Possibilities
spec.description: Part negotiator, part astrogator, and savvy in the ways of the galaxy beyond the Core Worlds, the Fringer is a jack-of-all-trades. He focuses on knowing how to find what he needs and how to get where he needs to go. He's got the gift of gab when it's time to talk, and the awareness and reflexes to maneuver away when it's time to run.
